page.title: 16Itchenor area communications
page.content: There are two postal deliveries amd two collections a day, with the exception of Sunday, in this area, one in the morning and one in the afternoon, deliveries being made to the houses and collections from the boxes. There are three letter boxes, one in Itchenor village, one at Malthouse Cottages, and one at the top of Chapel Lane which is an original Victorian wall box. There is one public telephone box by the Marine Police Office in The Street but the majority of residents have a private telephone.
